Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the film 'Jurassic Park'?
Questions.Explanation: John Williams composed the iconic music for the film 'Jurassic Park', known for its thrilling and majestic themes.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'My Heart Will Go On'?
Questions.Explanation: The song 'My Heart Will Go On' is featured in the film 'Titanic', becoming a worldwide hit.

Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the 'Harry Potter' film series?
Questions.Explanation: John Williams composed the enchanting music for the early 'Harry Potter' films, setting the magical tone.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'Let It Go'?
Questions.Explanation: The song 'Let It Go' is featured in the film 'Frozen', becoming a popular anthem.

Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the 'Star Wars' film series?
Questions.Explanation: John Williams composed the iconic music for the 'Star Wars' film series, creating memorable themes.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'I Will Always Love You'?
Questions.Explanation: The song 'I Will Always Love You' is featured in the film 'The Bodyguard', becoming a chart-topping hit.

Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the film 'The Lion King'?
Questions.Explanation: Hans Zimmer composed the majestic music for the film 'The Lion King', capturing the essence of the African savannah.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'Can't Stop the Feeling!'?
Questions.Explanation: The song 'Can't Stop the Feeling!' is featured in the film 'Trolls', bringing infectious joy.

Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the 'Pirates of the Caribbean' film series?
Questions.Explanation: Hans Zimmer composed the adventurous music for the 'Pirates of the Caribbean' film series, evoking swashbuckling excitement.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'Footloose'?
Questions.Explanation: The film 'Footloose' features the song 'Footloose', becoming a dance anthem.

Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the film 'Inception'?
Questions.Explanation: Hans Zimmer composed the intense and dreamlike music for the film 'Inception', enhancing its mind-bending narrative.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'Eye of the Tiger'?
Questions.Explanation: The film 'Rocky III' features the song 'Eye of the Tiger', becoming an iconic sports anthem.

Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the 'Lord of the Rings' film series?
Questions.Explanation: Howard Shore composed the epic and immersive music for the 'Lord of the Rings' film series, enhancing its fantastical world.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'I Will Survive'?
Questions.Explanation: The film 'Priscilla, Queen of the Desert' features the song 'I Will Survive', becoming an empowering anthem.

Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the film 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial'?
Questions.Explanation: John Williams composed the heartwarming and magical music for the film 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial', capturing the bond between a boy and an alien.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'Don't You (Forget About Me)'?
Questions.Explanation: The film 'The Breakfast Club' features the song 'Don't You (Forget About Me)', becoming an iconic anthem of teenage rebellion.

Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the 'Indiana Jones' film series?
Questions.Explanation: John Williams composed the adventurous and thrilling music for the 'Indiana Jones' film series, capturing the spirit of adventure.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'Stayin' Alive'?
Questions.Explanation: The film 'Saturday Night Fever' features the song 'Stayin' Alive', becoming a disco anthem.

Questions.Question: Who composed the music for the film 'The Dark Knight'?
Questions.Explanation: Hans Zimmer composed the intense and brooding music for the film 'The Dark Knight', enhancing its dark and gritty atmosphere.

Questions.Question: Which film features the song 'Somewhere Over the Rainbow'?
Questions.Explanation: The film 'The Wizard of Oz' features the song 'Somewhere Over the Rainbow', becoming an enduring classic.
